Calculate Monthly Days in AR

Source: R/dar_month.R
dar_month.Rd

Calculate Monthly Days in AR

Usage

dar_month(df, date = date, gct = gct, earb = earb, dart = 35)

Arguments

df

data frame containing at least three columns: a date column, a gross charges column and an ending AR column

date

column containing a date within the month that Days in AR is to be calculated

gct

column containing a month's total Gross Charges

earb

column containing a month's Ending AR balance

dart

target Days in AR, default is 35 days

Value

data frame

Examples

dar_month(dar_mon_ex, date, gct, earb, dart = 39.445)
#>          date      gct     earb nmon     month ndip      adc   dar actual ideal
#> 1  2022-01-01 325982.0 288432.5    1   January   31 10515.55 27.43   0.88  1.27
